languages.text: {n}Среди бунтовщиков подле трона вы замечаете женщину с всклокоченными волосами и девочку-подростка с короткой стрижкой. Вы {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}узнаете{/d} сестру и племянницу Инфернус-мастера, Нэми и Мию. На их лицах нет былой приветливости — лишь мрачная решимость и ненависть.{/n}

{n}Among the mutineers by the throne, you spot a dishevelled woman and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Среди бунтовщиков подле трона вы замечаете женщину с всклокоченными волосами и девочку-подростка с короткой стрижкой. Вы {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}узнаете{/d} сестру и племянницу Инфернус-мастера, Нэми и Мию. На их лицах нет былой приветливости — лишь мрачная решимость и ненависть.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Among the mutineers near the throne, you spot a woman with dishevelled hair and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You recognise the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with grim determination and hatred.{/n}

You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Entre los amotinados junto al trono reconoces a una mujer desharrapada y a una adolescente con pelo corto. Las {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}reconoces{/d}: la hermana y la sobrina del maestro de Infernus, Nemi y Mia. Su expresión ya no es amistosa, sino que la retuercen la determinación y el odio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the mutineers by the throne, you spot a dishevelled woman and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Entre los amotinados junto al trono reconoces a una mujer desharrapada y a una adolescente con pelo corto. Las reconoces: la hermana y la sobrina del maestro de Infernus, Nemi y Mia. Su expresión ya no es amistosa, sino que la retuercen la determinación y el odio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}王座で反乱を起こした人間の中に、みすぼらしい姿の女と短い髪の10代の少女を見つけた。インフェルヌス・マスターの{d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}姉と姪{/d}、ネミとミアだ。彼女たちの顔はもはや友好的ではなく、決意と憎悪に歪んでいる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the mutineers by the throne, you spot a dishevelled woman and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}王座で反乱を起こした人間の中に、みすぼらしい姿の女と短い髪の10代の少女を見つけた。インフェルヌス・マスターの姉と姪、ネミとミアだ。彼女たちの顔はもはや友好的ではなく、決意と憎悪に歪んでいる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}在舰长宝座旁边的叛乱分子之中，你注意到了一个蓬头垢面的女人和一个剪着短发的年轻姑娘。你{d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}认出{/d}来这两个人是涅米和米娅，控火大师的妹妹和侄女。然而，她们的脸上不再挂着友好的笑容，而是充满了扭曲的决心与恨意。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the mutineers by the throne, you spot a dishevelled woman and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在舰长宝座旁边的叛乱分子之中，你注意到了一个蓬头垢面的女人和一个剪着短发的年轻姑娘。你认出来这两个人是涅米和米娅，控火大师的妹妹和侄女。然而，她们的脸上不再挂着友好的笑容，而是充满了扭曲的决心与恨意。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unter den Meuterern vor dem Thron erblickst du eine ungepflegte Frau und eine Jugendliche mit kurzen Haaren. Du {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}erkennst{/d} die Schwester und Nichte des Infernus-Meisters, Nemi und Mia. Ihre Gesichter sind nicht mehr freundlich, sondern von Entschlossenheit und Hass entstellt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the mutineers by the throne, you spot a dishevelled woman and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}

Du erkennst die Schwester und Nichte des Infernus-Meisters, Nemi und Mia. Ihre Gesichter sind nicht mehr freundlich, sondern von Entschlossenheit und Hass entstellt.{/n}

{n}Unter den Meuterern vor dem Thron erblickst du eine ungepflegte Frau und eine Jugendliche mit kurzen Haaren. Du erkennst die Schwester und Nichte des Infernus-Meisters, Nemi und Mia. Ihre Gesichter sind nicht mehr freundlich, sondern von Entschlossenheit und Hass entstellt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Parmi les mutins assemblés près du trône, vous repérez une femme ébouriffée accompagnée d'une adolescente aux cheveux courts. Vous {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}reconnaissez{/d} la sœur et la nièce du maître-infernus, Nemi et Mia. Les regards qu'elles vous adressent n'ont plus rien d'amical, mais brûlent à la place d'une haine et d'une détermination sans bornes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the mutineers by the throne, you spot a dishevelled woman and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tahtın yanındaki isyancıların arasında darmadağın saçlı bir kadın ve kısa saç kesimine sahip bir genç kız görüyorsun. İtfa Üstadı'nın kız kardeşini ve yeğenini, Nemi'yi ve Mia'yı {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}tanıyorsun{/d}. Artık dost canlısı olmayan yüzleri, kararlılık ve nefretle büzülmüş.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Among the mutineers by the throne, you spot a dishevelled woman and a teenage girl with a short haircut. You {d|Encyclopedia:HelpedInfernusFamily}recognise{/d} the Infernus Master's sister and niece, Nemi and Mia. Their faces are no longer friendly, but twisted with determination and hatred.{/n}
